Developer Terms of Use
des: Hosted by four-time New York Times Best Selling author & founder of Mindshare Collaborative, JJ Virgin, along with her partner and CEO Karl Krummenacher, the Mindshare Mindcast introduces thought leaders and business experts like Todd Herman, Allison Maslan, Pete Vargas, Chelene Johnson, Mike Koenigs, Dr. Joseph Antoun, Dr. Sachin Patel, Celeste Fine, Miki and Radha Agrawal, Chris Ducker, Michael Bernoff, Nicholas Kusmich and others to a global community of health experts and entrepreneurs.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
